body_html:
There's a PR for Eigen to support double at the moment:

https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/216/enable-efficient-tensor-reduction-for/diff

You can add yourself to the interest list of that PR. As soon as that's available, you can explicitly make your input tensor to be of dtype double and get the accuracy you prefer. How does that sound?

body:
There's a PR for Eigen to support double at the moment:

https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/216/enable-efficient-tensor-reduction-for/diff

You can add yourself to the interest list of that PR. As soon as that's available, you can explicitly make your input tensor to be of dtype double and get the accuracy you prefer. How does that sound?
